description: This Dart source file defines the HomeScreen widget for a Flutter mobile application. It manages user interactions such as displaying a greeting, navigating to different app sections via a grid of tiles, and handling logout functionality.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the main home screen of the app. It includes user greeting, navigation options displayed as a grid, and a logout button.

methods.name: _logout
methods.description: Triggers the logout process by calling AuthState's logout method, then navigates to the login route.
